description: the configuration for grading criteria which be used for LLMentor

rubrics.name: Language/Quality
rubrics.description: Assessment of language quality and structural coherence of the text

criteria.name: Language quality
criteria.description: Evaluation of linguistic accuracy and sentence clarity

scoring.description: many linguistic errors (over 10 errors) (e.g. wrong tense, wrong personal pronouns)
few linguistic errors (0-10 errors), clear and comprehensible sentences
no linguistic errors (0 errors), clear and comprehensible sentences with consistent terminology
